posts.post_title: SGC A Cy Young and Fred Abbott
posts.post_content:
Couple of nice SGC A cards here - both present really well.  Prices include shipping - PPFF or Venmo.  

Cy Young Bare Hand Shows (Piedmont) - $1,900
Fred Abbott (Sweet Caporal) - SOLD

Thanks!
